short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension for the SessionLab website. It calculates the time of delivery for each facilitator.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SessionLab is a really powerful tool for facilitators, used for keeping track of time and content while delivering sessions. This enhancement addresses its shortcomings by adding facilitators' delivery time division. How to use it? Simply open the Session info tab on the right and you'll see new information there, with all the time division summed up.
